item.description:
Please bring appropriate Intellectual Snob Raiment (COSTUME), whatever is in your wardrobe already!

Appropriately in this age of economic woe, we meet at Grendel's (a character in Beowulf) which has a half price menu between 5 and 7:30 (order latest by 7:00) along with the purchase of a $3 drink.

In the age of intellectual snobs, such as the Dadaists, Existentialists, and well beyond into the 60's, conspiracies were the norm. That nowadays is quickly returning to the forefront! Every Intellectual Snob has a conspiracy theory, and we would love to hear you share them incognito.

Let every Intellectual Snob deposit his or her favorite theory into a container in our midst, wherefrom others may pluck such theories and share it with the others should they deem it of interest. This may lead to much laughter, but others will be baffled and perhaps enlightened.

P.S. PSEUDO-intellectual theories are ALLOWED.

Please in this month of October be encouraged to bring along your favorite intellectual snob COSTUME--(Snobs are notorious fakers)--one little thing is enough; an Ascot, a top hat, bow tie, a fake moustache, a Periwig, a Goatee, a Monocle, corduroy clothing, the usual. Be advised: Absinthe is not on the menu. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes, please.

Take heed! Do not attempt to be late. The place gets louder and more crowded, and service quality diminishes after 5:30. Please bring cash! So as not to overwhelm the staff with our already startling appearance.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for startling Intellectual Snob getups.
item.name: Intellectual Snob Mixer: Conspiracy Theories
